// Pivot 0, 0
int FlipperL2[16] = {
	1, 4,
	0, 8,
	2, 13,
	9, 15,
	35, 11,
	39, 7,
	36, 2,
	5, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float FlipperL2[16] = {
	0.025000f, 0.266667f,
	0.000000f, 0.533333f,
	0.050000f, 0.866667f,
	0.225000f, 1.000000f,
	0.875000f, 0.733333f,
	0.975000f, 0.466667f,
	0.900000f, 0.133333f,
	0.125000f, 0.000000f
};
